participant_1.name: Ravi
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and energetic, I enjoy exploring new trails and pushing my limits. I am passionate about outdoor activities and prefer a healthy lifestyle.
participant_1.background: I enjoy mountain biking as a hobby. I do not drink alcohol. My father was a construction worker. I hate the color pink. I am a huge coffee lover.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Disciplined and practical, I have a straightforward approach to life. My experiences have taught me to value resilience and camaraderie.
participant_2.background: I'm in the army. I didn't graduate high school. My favourite food is shawarma. I live in Canada.

content.text: I see. I like mountain biking.
